Class Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Score

  • public class Score
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Object to hold the current game's score You probably do not want to modify this class, although you are welcome to do so.
    Version:
    10/2019
    Author:
    Stephen Blythe

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Score()
      Constructor that initializes game score to 0 (all games start with a score of 0) and draws the corresponding image.

      resets score value to zero.
